text: Robert John "Bob" Carr (born 28 September 1947) was a Labor member of the Australian senate from 6 March 2012 to 24 October 2013 and Foreign Minister 13 March 2012 to 18 September 2013. Before that, he was Premier of New South Wales from 1995 to 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of New South Wales Category:Politicians from Sydney Category:Australian Labor Party politicians Category:Members of the Australian Senate Category:Australian ministers for Foreign Affairs Category:Leaders of the Opposition of Australian states and territories
title: Bob Carr
